string.value: I heard #r#p9120005##k of Showa Town is setting up a master plan. I better hear this.

She wanted to purchase a machine owned by #r#p2050002##k which is made out of the finest technology in the universe, but was short on money, so #r#p9120005##k asked me to pitch in for her. #n5,000,000 mesos is a LOT of money...
I handed #r#p9120005##k 5,000,000 mesos. Can she buy it, though?
Ahh, just a little more money, and I may be able to purchase the dream machine... um, hey stranger! How would you like to invest in a Dream Machine and buy it with me?
The dream machine is actually a device owned by #r#p2050002##k that consists of the most advanced technology known in the universe, and what it does is it changes a matter into something else.
The machine can change #b#t4011005##k into various different items.
With this, I can always use #b#t4011005##k to make either a powerful weapon, a rare item, or something else. This will make me RICH!

The problem is, recently a competitor has emerged and started taking profits away from my store, which has put a dent on trying to come up with the fund to purchasing the machine. This is why I want you to invest #r5,000,000 mesos#k in this machine for me.
In any case, I do not have much time, so I would appreciate it if we take care of this quickly.
I'm disappointed in you. To the common folk, a slick-looking device is always more attractive than a great invention.
Oh wow, that was fast! Well, then I'll get started with the purchasing, so give me the money the next time you come back here~
I don't think you have enough money, yet. That' #b5,000,000 mesos#k.
